text: Brian Molko (born 10 December 1972) is a Scottish singer and songwriter. He is part of the rock band Placebo. He is considered to be the leader of Placebo. He is the rhythm guitarist of the band. Molko is openly bisexual. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Bisexual people Category:British rock guitarists Category:LGBT musicians Category:Musicians from Brussels Category:Scottish LGBT people Category:Scottish rock musicians Category:Scottish rock singers Category:Scottish singer-songwriters
title: Brian Molko
